comments.body: no biggie but should we capitalize it? I don't know. will leave it to you.
I don't particularly care either way. Given that this is pulled directly from the SQL manual and this is the style they went with, I'm ok with keeping it as is.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +101,105 @@|SQLSTATE|Class|Condition                                                   |Subclass|Subcondition                                                   |
|--------|-----|------------------------------------------------------------|--------|---------------------------------------------------------------|
|07000   |07   |dynamic SQL error                                           |000     |(no subclass)                                                  |
|07001   |07   |dynamic SQL error                                           |001     |using clause does not match dynamic parameter specifications   |
|07002   |07   |dynamic SQL error                                           |002     |using clause does not match target specifications              |
